statements: SELECT * FROM GovernanceLogs;
SELECT topic, member_name FROM GovernanceLogs WHERE meeting_type = 'Board Meeting';
SELECT meeting_date, action_taken FROM GovernanceLogs WHERE member_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM GovernanceLogs ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_type, COUNT(*) FROM GovernanceLogs GROUP BY meeting_type;
SELECT * FROM GovernanceLogs ORDER BY meeting_date DESC, log_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT topic, member_name FROM GovernanceLogs WHERE meeting_type = 'Board Meeting' AND action_taken IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT topic FROM GovernanceLogs WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT log_id, member_name FROM GovernanceLogs WHERE topic LIKE '%finance%' AND meeting_type = 'Budget Discussion'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, meeting_type FROM GovernanceLogs GROUP BY meeting_type ORDER BY total_logs DESC
SELECT * FROM logs_of_meetings;
SELECT meeting_description, meeting_date FROM logs_of_meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, actions_taken FROM logs_of_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM governance_members WHERE member_role = 'Chairperson';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_members FROM governance_members;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, meeting_description FROM logs_of_meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_description, meeting_date FROM logs_of_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_date, meeting_id, actions_taken FROM logs_of_meetings WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM governance_members WHERE member_role = 'Chairperson';
SELECT member_id, member_name, member_email FROM governance_members WHERE member_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM governance_meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_theme FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT meeting_description FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_theme LIKE '%report%';
SELECT meeting_id, COUNT(attendees_ids) AS attendees_count FROM governance_meetings GROUP BY meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM action_items WHERE assigned_to IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM governance_meetings ORDER BY meeting_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_description FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_theme = 'Finance' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM meeting_date) = 2022;
SELECT meeting_id, COUNT(*) FROM meeting_notes GROUP BY meeting_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM action_items WHERE assigned_to IS NOT NULL AND due_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_theme FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_description LIKE '%update%';
SELECT * FROM governance_meetings;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM governance_meetings;
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM governance_members ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_meetings FROM governance_meetings;
SELECT * FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_notes FROM governance_meetings JOIN meeting_attendance ON governance_meetings.meeting_id = meeting_attendance.meeting_id WHERE attendance_status = true;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM governance_members ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT meeting_date, COUNT(member_id) AS total_attendees FROM governance_meetings JOIN meeting_attendance ON governance_meetings.meeting_id = meeting_attendance.meeting_id GROUP BY meeting_date;
SELECT action_id, action_description FROM meeting_actions WHERE action_status = false ORDER BY action_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM governance_meetings;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT meeting_notes FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM meeting_attendees ORDER BY attendee_name DESC;
SELECT discussion_topic, discussion_notes FROM meeting_discussions WHERE meeting_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_notes FROM governance_meetings WHERE meeting_id = 5
SELECT * FROM meeting_attendees JOIN governance_meetings ON meeting_attendees.meeting_id = governance_meetings.meeting_id
SELECT * FROM meeting_actions WHERE action_status = 'pending' ORDER BY action_id DESC
SELECT meeting_topic, COUNT(attendee_id) AS attendee_count FROM governance_meetings JOIN meeting_attendees ON governance_meetings.meeting_id = meeting_attendees.meeting_id GROUP BY meeting_topic
